title: Colors
lyrics:
I'll find you 
Go back through walls we made (eeh)
I see you, I need you every day
It's nothing, it's your life
I don't know why (eeh)
Can't get what I want

I keep, I keep trying



Found our way through the lost years

Now the day brings it all here



All my colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

She says, see it in your eyes

All the colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

Tell me, do you feel alive?



All my colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

She says, love is in your eyes

All the colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

Tell me, do you feel alive?



Feel alive... feel alive



I've got all the love you need

I've got all the love you need

Keep it with you (eeh)

I don't have the time to wait

I don't have the time to wait

I need to see you



Got it all under control

Got it all under control

You can't hear me (eeh)

Now it only hurts to know

Now it only hurts to know

When you don't need me

You don't need me



Found our way through the lost years

Now the day brings it all here



All my colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

She says, see it in your eyes

All the colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

Tell me, do you feel alive? 



Feel alive... do you feel alive?



All my colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

She says, see it in your eyes

All the colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

Tell me, do you feel alive?



All my colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

She says, love is in your eyes

All the colors (see the colors)

Feel the colors (feel the colors) 

Tell me, do you feel alive?
